mapper.select: SELECT desglose.id, articulo_relation.id_articulo AS item_relation_articulo_id, articulo_relation.descripcion AS item_relation_articulo_descripcion, color_articulo_relation.color AS item_relation_articulo_color, desglose.comment, desglose.amount, desglose.fg_active, desglose.created_at, desglose.updated_at FROM desglose_almacen desglose INNER JOIN articulo articulo_init ON (articulo_init.id_articulo = desglose.item_init_id) INNER JOIN articulo articulo_relation ON (articulo_relation.id_articulo = desglose.item_relation_id) INNER JOIN color color_articulo_relation ON (color_articulo_relation.id_color = articulo_relation.id_color ) WHERE desglose.fg_active = '1' AND desglose.id = #{id} ORDER BY articulo_relation.descripcion
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO desglose_almacen ( item_init_id, item_relation_id, comment, amount, fg_active, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{itemInit.articuloId}, #{itemRelation.articuloId}, #{comment}, #{amount}, #{fgActive}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
